Class ContactsAsyncHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • Handler
      • org.sipdroid.sipua.phone.ContactsAsyncHelper

  • public class ContactsAsyncHelper
extends Handler
    Helper class for async access of images.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ContactsAsyncHelper.ImageTracker
      public inner class to help out the ContactsAsyncHelper callers with tracking the state of the CallerInfo Queries and image loading.
      static interface  ContactsAsyncHelper.OnImageLoadCompleteListener
      Interface for a WorkerHandler result return.

      • updateImageViewWithContactPhotoAsync

        public static final void updateImageViewWithContactPhotoAsync(CallerInfo info,
                                        int token,
                                        ContactsAsyncHelper.OnImageLoadCompleteListener listener,
                                        java.lang.Object cookie,
                                        Context context,
                                        ImageView imageView,
                                        Uri person,
                                        int placeholderImageResource)
        Start an image load, attach the result to the specified CallerInfo object. Note, when the query is started, we make the ImageView INVISIBLE if the placeholderImageResource value is -1. When we're given a valid (!= -1) placeholderImageResource value, we make sure the image is visible.
